biotools.summary: Estimates haplotype-specific odds ratios from genotype data on unrelated cases and controls using unconditional logistic regression. It can adjust for the main effects of relevant covariates and estimate stratum-specific haplotype effects.

bioschemas.name: HAPPY
bioschemas.summary: Estimates haplotype-specific odds ratios from genotype data on unrelated cases and controls using unconditional logistic regression. It can adjust for the main effects of relevant covariates and estimate stratum-specific haplotype effects.
